step_feedback.feedback: Good job on step 1! Your arms are close to your chest and your muscles are tightened. Keep up the great work.
Excellent on step 2! You're opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
Great job on step 3! Your arms are extended and your muscles are relaxed. Continue with this smooth motion.
Well done on step 4! Your arms are moving horizontally and your muscles are relaxed. Keep the movements controlled.
Good job on step 5! Your arms are returning to the starting position. Focus on maintaining relaxed muscles.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! You consistently brought your arms in, tightened your muscles, and then extended them while relaxing. Keep up this smooth and controlled movement.
